stems.BSC: (to be) zero as the empty-set / a set having no members; to have no quantity or amount
stems.CTE: (to be) a party/entity of whom/which there are no members
stems.CSV: (to be) a set having no members; to have no [i.e., zero] members in a set
stems.OBJ: (to be) a null value / a value for a parameter that is undefined and/or for which the expected or standard value(s) is/are inapplicable

stems.BSC: (to be) the zero-dimension; to have geometrically no length, area or volume
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of having no substance/tangibility due to being zero-dimensional
stems.CSV: (to be) the process/act of determining/identifying zero-dimensionality
stems.OBJ: (to be) an entity having zero-dimensionality; (to be) a Euclidean point; to have geometrically no length, area or volume, i.e., to be a Euclidean point

stems.BSC: (to be) the baseline “zero”-state or null-state in a sequence, hierarchy, gradient, pattern, etc.
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of being the baseline “zero”-state or null-state
stems.CSV: (to be) a process which determines/identifies an entity’s being the baseline “zero”-state or null-state
stems.OBJ: (to be) the entity/party in the baseline “zero”-state or null- state in a sequence, hierarchy, gradient, pattern, etc.

stems.BSC: (to be) a set or group of one; to have one member
stems.CTE: (to be) a party/entity of whom/which there is only one
stems.CSV: (to be) a process which determines/identifies a set as being one in number; to count out to one; to determine that there is only one of something
stems.OBJ: [same as CTE]

stems.BSC: (to be) something (quasi-)indivisible, (quasi-)inseparable, unified, unitary, united, a union, a unit
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of having only one functional aspect/facet; to function/manifest as a unified whole or unit
stems.CSV: (to be) a process which determines/identifies an entity as having only one functional aspect/facet; to determine that an entity is a (quasi-)indivisible whole/unit
stems.OBJ: (to be) the party/entity having only one functional aspect/facet; to be an entity which functions/manifests as single unit

stems.BSC: (to be) the first entity/party in a group or sequence
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of being first in a sequence/group/pattern
stems.CSV: (to be) a process which determines/identifies an entity’s sequential place in a sequence or group/pattern to be first
stems.OBJ: (to be) the entity/party whose numerical place in a sequence/group/pattern is first

stems.OBJ: (to be) one in a group or sequence of **2**; to be one of **2**

stems.CSV: (to be) a process which determines/identifies an entity’s sequential place in a sequence or group/pattern to be **14**th
stems.OBJ: (to be) the entity/party whose numerical place in a sequence/group/pattern is **14**th

stems.BSC: (to be a) set or group of **15** entities; (to be) a **15**-some
stems.CTE: (to be) a party/entity of whom/which there are **15**
stems.CSV: (to be) a process which determines/identifies a set as being **15** in number; to count out to **15**; to determine that there are **15** of something
stems.OBJ: (to be) one in a group or sequence of **15**; to be one of **15**

stems.BSC: (to be) something manifesting **15** aspects / facets; to manifest **15**-ariness; be **15**-ary
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of having **15** aspects/facets; to be **15**-ary; to be **15**-fold or **15**-faceted
stems.CSV: (to be) a process which determines/identifies an entity as having **15** aspects/facets; identify/determine that something is **15**-ary/**15**-fold/**15**-faceted
stems.OBJ: (to be) one of the aspects/facets of a **15**-ary, **15**-fold, **15**-faceted entity

stems.BSC: (to be) the **15**th entity/party in a group or sequence
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of being **15**th in a sequence/group/pattern
stems.CSV: (to be) a process which determines/identifies an entity’s sequential place in a sequence or group/pattern to be **15**th
stems.OBJ: (to be) the entity/party whose numerical place in a sequence/group/pattern is **15**th

stems.BSC: (to be) an act/instance of changing the number of something via addition or subtraction
stems.CTE: (to be) the party/entity that performs/initiates an act of adding or subtracting
stems.CSV: (to be) a process of adding or subtracting
stems.OBJ: (to be) the party/entity whose number is changed via addition or subtraction

stems.BSC: (to be) an act/instance of adding the number of something; to add something
stems.CTE: (to be) the party/entity that performs/initiates an act of addition
stems.CSV: (to be) a process of addition
stems.OBJ: (to be) the party/entity whose number is added to

stems.BSC: (to be) an act/instance of subtracting the number of something; to subtract something
stems.CTE: (to be) the party/entity that performs/initiates an act of subtraction
stems.CSV: (to be) a process of subtraction
stems.OBJ: (to be) the party/entity whose number is subtracted

stems.BSC: (to be) an act/instance of changing the number of something via multiplication or division; to multiply either by iteration or by division
stems.CTE: (to be) the party/entity that performs/initiates an act of multiplying or dividing something
stems.CSV: (to be) a process of increasing via multiplication or division
stems.OBJ: (to be) the party/entity whose number is multiplied or divided

stems.BSC: (to be) an act/instance of multiplying the number of something; to multiply something
stems.CTE: (to be) the party/entity that performs/initiates an act of multiplying something
stems.CSV: (to be) a process of multiplication
stems.OBJ: (to be) the party/entity whose number is multiplied

stems.BSC: (to be) an act/instance of dividing the number of something; to divide something
stems.CTE: (to be) the party/entity that performs/initiates an act of dividing something
stems.CSV: (to be) a process of division
stems.OBJ: (to be) the party/entity whose number is divided

stems.BSC: (to be) a sequential numerical count(ing) of entities by natural numbers [i.e., positive integers] to determine the numerical quantity thereof; to count a set of entities, to tally the number of entities
stems.CTE: (to be) the [natural] number of entities counted; the count; to count (up)/tally using natural numbers [= focusing on the accrual/addition of numbers in anticipation of the total/tally]
stems.CSV: (to be) the process of counting/tallying; to count (up)/tally [= focusing on the counting process itself irrespective of the eventual total]
stems.OBJ: (to be) the entity/entities so counted

stems: (to be) a sequential numerical labeling [of entities by natural numbers] for purpose of identification, individuation, arrangement, etc.
(to be) a numerical(ly-based) pattern/arrangement; to enumerate

stems.BSC: (to be) a number; to express numerically
stems.CTE: (to be) a state of being expressed/expressible numerically
stems.CSV: (to be) an act of performing something by expressing it numerically, do something by using numbers
stems.OBJ: (to be) a numerical expression

stems: (to be) an integer, express via integers *
(to be) a rational number, express via rational numbers * [i.e., expressible as a ratio of two integers]
notes: (* concatenate an appropriate stem from the root -**TVY**-with this stem to indicate positive or negative numbers)

refers: REAL NUMBER / IRRATIONAL NUMBER / IMAGINARY NUMBER

stems.BSC: (to be) a real number
stems.CTE: (to be) a state of being expressed/expressible as a real number
stems.CSV: (to be) an act of performing something by expressing it as a real number, do something by using real numbers
stems.OBJ: (to be) a real number expression

stems: (to be) an irrational number [i.e., not expressible as a ratio of two integers]
(to be) an imaginary/complex number [i.e., a multiple of i]

stems.BSC: (to be) a mathematical variable; to express as a mathematical variable
stems.CTE: (to be) a state of being expressed/expressible as a mathematical variable
stems.CSV: (to be) an act of performing something by expressing it as a mathematical variable, do something by using a mathematical variable
stems.OBJ: (to be) a mathematical function, a mathematical expression using a variable or variables

stems: (to be) a mathematical coefficient; to express as a mathematical coefficient
(to be) a mathematical constant; to express as a mathematical constant

refers: ABSTRACT OBJECT / ABSTRACT STRUCTURE / ABSTRACT OPERATION

stems.BSC: (to be) an abstract object; to operate/ function as an abstract object [i.e., an abstract entity governed by abstract rules]
stems.CTE: (to be) a defining property (or set of defining properties) of an abstract object
stems.CSV: (to be) the specific identity of an abstract object; to identify an abstract object
stems.OBJ: (to be) a property/attribute peculiar to a particular abstract object

stems.BSC: (to be) an abstract structure; to operate/function as an abstract structure [i.e., a grouping of abstract objects that displays certain predetermined qualities and supports certain operations, e.g., an algebraic structure]
stems.CTE: (to be) a component of such a structure
stems.CSV: (to be) the defining purpose/function of such a structure; to define the purpose/function of such a structure
stems.OBJ: (to be) a property/operation manifested or supported by such a structure

stems.BSC: (to be) an operation performed upon an abstract object or structure; to perform such an operation [i.e., a rule-based transformation of abstract objects]
stems.CTE: (to be) the underlying rule that forms the basis for an abstract operation
stems.CSV: (to be) an act/process of performing/carrying out such an operation; to perform/carry out/apply an abstract operation
stems.OBJ: (to be) the (desired) transformation precipitated by performance/application of an abstract operation

notes: Use an appropriate degree of the OAU affix with the stems of the above root to generate a term for “argument” or “abstract entity” meaning a logical participant or referenced entity within a logical argument, e.g., “In linguistics, we speak of the various nouns within a sentence as being *arguments* to a verb.”
